sentences.en: A group of students placed a wreath at the tomb of the national hero.
sentences.cn: 一群学生在那位民族英雄墓前献上花圈.

sentences.en: A wreath was laid on the monument to a fanfare of trumpets.
sentences.cn: 在响亮的号角声中花圈被献在纪念碑前.

sentences.en: Again, you can use them through Christmas and tuck the berries into whatever wreath you already have on your door.
sentences.cn: 同样的，你可以用它们来作为圣诞节的装饰品，也可以把浆果用在你挂在门上的花环的装扮上。

sentences.en: He had to pose wearing a laurel wreath.
sentences.cn: 他得摆好戴着月桂花冠的姿势.

sentences.en: He was wearing a Roman kilt and laurel wreath.
sentences.cn: 他身穿罗马人的褶叠短裙,头戴桂冠.

sentences.en: His children sold his house with the black wreath still on the door.
sentences.cn: 丧事的花圈还挂在门上,他的子女就把房子卖掉了.

sentences.en: Julius Caesar wore a laurel wreath to cover the onset of baldness.
sentences.cn: 恺撒戴桂冠是为了掩饰秃头.

sentences.en: Ornate gold leaves woven into a wreath and carefully tucked into a funerary vessel.
sentences.cn: 一顶用金叶子围成的、装饰得特别华丽的花冠被发现精心装于一个骨灰盒里。

sentences.en: She is weaving the flowers into a wreath.
She twined the flowers into a wreath.
The prime minister laid a wreath at the war memorial.
sentences.cn: 首相向战争纪念碑献了花圈。

sentences.en: The prize had originally been a wreath of parsley.
sentences.cn: 原来是用欧芹编的环作为奖品的.

sentences.en: The Queen laid a poppy wreath at the war memorial.
sentences.cn: 女王向阵亡将士纪念碑献了罂粟花圈.

sentences.en: The Queen laid a wreath at the war memorial.
sentences.cn: 女王向阵亡将士纪念碑献了花圈。

sentences.en: The veil of the maiden is white; the wreath of roses which she wears is white.
sentences.cn: 小姑娘的面纱是白的, 她戴的蔷薇花环也是白色的.

sentences.en: They are laying wreath s, praying and honoring the dead.
sentences.cn: 他们制作花圈, 祈祷纪念那些死去的人们.

sentences.en: Those children have been twisting the wreath off again.
sentences.cn: 那些孩子又把花冠扭了下来.

sentences.en: Want to use wreath, must buy in funeral parlour.
sentences.cn: 要用花圈, 必须在殡仪馆购买.

words.tran_cn: 缭绕；成圈状；扭曲；环绕盘旋
用花环装饰；将…做成花环；包围；覆盖

trans.tran_cn: 花环，花圈，（烟、云等的）圈状物，环状物
trans.tran_en: a circle made from leaves or flowers that you put on the place where a person is buried
